description:
Class 2-3 enjoys some time at the beach during their summer vacation and Haruaki and Sano learn about youkai births.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: L`été, la mer… et la rentrée
Natsu Da! Umi Da! Are? Mou Hachigatsu Sanjuuichinichi Da...
Summer! The Ocean! Huh? It`s Already August 31st...
夏だ! 海だ! あれ? もう八月三十一日だ...
